title: KIM SWITCH / flashlight
description: Fires when you remain in the dark with Kim

title: TENT ORB / stickers
description: Stickers -- just like the one from the church padlock.

title: WHIRLING / DREAM1
description: Adrift in an alcohol induced oblivion, the faculties of your mind speak to you.

title: WHIRLING / CEILING FAN
description: The ceiling fan is spinning like the blades of some rickety old airship about to fall on you. A truly horrendous neck-tie has somehow attached itself to one of the blades.

title: WHIRLING / BATHROOM MIRROR
description: A mirror hangs on the bathroom wall, above a bent and broken sink.

title: WHIRLING F2 / KLAASJE 1
description: A striking young woman in a silver body-suit smokes in the hostel hallway. She addresses you as if you were a police officer. You may use your finger pistols for a SUGGESTION red-check. Failure gives you some forewarning about what's going on.

title: WHIRLING / KIM INTRO
description: Downstairs ltn Kim Kitsuragi - precinct 57th's finest - is waiting to solve THE HANGED MAN with you as an inter-district co-op. It would appear Precinct 41 sent you to investigate the lynching of a "Whitewater mercenary" in "Martinaise". And that you are indeed a police officer. Kim briefs you on the case and your relationship begins - likely on the wrong foot, but not necessarily.

title: WHIRLING F1 / GARTE
description: ltn Kitsuragi suggests you talk to the manager of the Whirling-in-Rags first. Garte is a hub of knowledge on the area and the case and you will come back to him later. He is also a problem, asking you to pay for the night, to pay for "the damages". It does not reflect well on you.

title: YARD / HANGED MAN
description: A corpse hangs from the pine-tree: a middle aged man in white armour boots and tighty whities. A medium PERCEPTION white-check lets you find a bullet hole in the back of his mouth, a low LOGIC white check that he was killed before hanging. A low THOUGHT CABINET w-c sees that the bullet is antique.

title: WESTCOAST / EXECUTIONS VISCAL
description: An easy PERCEPTION check highlights a scattering of bullet holes in the wall. Pass a medium VISUAL CALCULUS and the interact appears as a ghostly mass execution perpetrated by dotted lines against a row of figures facing the wall. Either way, dialogue with the object has you and Lt Kitsuragi figure out it was an execution after the amphibious assault. You may relive it as an INLAND EMPIRE dream sequence later.

title: WHIRLING F3 / KLAASJE MAIN
description:
Meeting Klaasje again, on the roof
0) Intro
1) Your name and 
2) why u here? (orbs and drugs from room) 
3) Wildflower
5) did you hear me night before / last time we saw
6) Looking for Ruby

title: VILLAGE / WASHERWOMAN
description: The Washing Woman who gives you access to the alternate sleeping location -- the shack. Includes fishing village mood and Evrart quest stuff.

title: WESTCOAST / MORELL
description: Morell, the husband of Lena, is a cryptozoologist trying to find the Insulindian phasmid.

title: ICE / ACELE
description: Lead-in to the speedfreaks, out on the ice

title: ICE / AFTER CRYING KIM
description: Automatically starts after Acele's dialogue ends with her line "Crying is good. Get it out and then maybe we can talk, okay?"

title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / hearing kineema
description: An infernal machine comes to a halt somewhere outside.

title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / trashed tape player
description: This reel-to-reel tape player is still on, rolling empty.

title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / locked door
description: You must value privacy. The door has been locked from the inside.

title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / piles of tape
description: Looks like someone tore out the tape while the song was playing.

title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / bathroom smell
description: Words fail to describe how rank it smells in here. They should have sent a poet.

title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / calendar
description: The calendar says it's March. The year is '51.

title: WHIRLING F1 / GARTE MAIN
description: This is Garte's main dialogue for the rest of the game

title: WHIRLING / KIM MAIN
description: These are the rest of Kims MAIN dialogues with you after he's in the squad.

title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / speaker
description: The speaker is connected to the radio. The music is seasoned with static.

title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / karaoke mic
description: A big old karaoke mic just waiting for someone to sing into it.

title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / lyrics stand
description: This is where the lyrics would be.

title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / dialogue karaoke inspiration
WHIRLING F1 ORB / stage presence
description: This feels right. You *belong* here.

title: YARD / TRASH
description: You can click on the trash container. This lets you see the padlock has a Whirling-in-Rags logo on it -> go to Garte -> ask for key -> open container - > get your paperwork

title: YARD ORB / logo trivia
description: This is the logo of the Municipality of Revachol.

title: YARD / CUNO barks
description: Cuno throws stones and sometimes responds to Cunoesse

title: YARD / CUNOESSE barks
description: Cunoesse eggs Cuno on.

title: PLAZA ORB / rain shivers
description: rain shivers

title: YARD / FOOTPRINTS VISCAL
description: Easy perception shows prints. Then a medium VISUAL CALCULUS reveals a numbered scheme of footprints. Interaction with the scheme lets you deduce how many vigilantes there were at the hanging, when it happened etc.

title: YARD ORB / death smell
description: Smells like spoiled meat and curdled dairy. A human being decomposes.

title: WHIRLING F2 / BROKEN WINDOW VISCAL
description: A medium Viscal sees the shards are facing outwards.

title: PLAZA / TARE DRUNK barks
description: A drunk girl who has fallen down the stairs near the waterfront. You can steal her tare bag. She mumbles something about bottles..

title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / neon sign
description: The neon sign glistens in the morning light: WHIRLING-IN-RAGS.

title: PLAZA / TIRETRACKS VISCAL
description: You notice a set of a motor carriage tracks backing into the fence.

title: PLAZA ORB / book pate
description: This is a book about pâté.

title: PLAZA ORB / book offspring
description: This book is on the subject of raising your offspring properly.

title: PLAZA ORB / book unimportant
description: This book... you don’t really understand what it is about, nor does it seem important.

title: PLAZA ORB / book boring
description: A book about boiadeiro culture. It promotes freedom and *roaming upstream*.

title: PLAZA ORB / future book
description: A book about the future. The government reads your mind using radio technology.

title: PLAZA ORB / book world conquering
description: A book about conquering the world by concentrating really hard.

title: PLAZA ORB / book softcover
description: A soggy softcover. The sea air has ruined it.

title: PLAZA ORB / book erotica
description: This book has a rose, a pistol and a half naked dame on its cover.

title: PLAZA ORB / book wholeness
description: On the cover stands a very muscular man, surrounded by flames.

title: PLAZA ORB / wholeness inland
description: The book is titled: 'Man from Hjelmdall and the Wild Fire.'

title: PLAZA ORB / streetsign fuck the police
description: The street sign reads: "FUCK THE POLICE."

title: PLAZA ORB / streetsign pigs go home
description: "PIGS GO HOME!" The street name is illegible.

title: PLAZA ORB / doomed number
description: Rue de Saint-Ghislaine 8B

title: PLAZA ORB / whirling number
description: Closed for winter. Please use main entrance.

title: PLAZA ORB / sign to roundabout
description: To: Roundabout North

title: PLAZA ORB / sign to apts
description: To: Capeside apts; Martinaise pier

title: PLAZA ORB / sign to gislaine
description: To: Rue de Saint-Ghislaine

title: PLAZA ORB / crack inland
description: Maybe a sea monster did this to the plaza?

title: PLAZA ORB / crack logic
description: The damage looks like it could've been caused by an earthquake.

title: PLAZA ORB / doomed cellar scent
description: The musty smell of a potato cellar in spring emanates from the air vent.

title: PLAZA ORB / bulletholes
description: A splatter of bullet holes lines the wall.

title: PLAZA ORB / bulletholes esprit
description: esprit the corps afterthought

title: PLAZA / mailbox
description: A mailbox on the plaza.

title: Add even more beauty to the wall
description: You have seen an exceptionally beautiful wall in Martinaise, near the pier, and have decided to add to its beauty, artistically. This will take a brush first? Who would have one? Then paint, and then the act itself.

title: BACKYARD ORB / painting the wall
description: FinishTask("TASK.add_even_more_beauty_to_the_wall_done")

title: YARD / HANGED MAN AUTOPSY
description:
This is phase two of the hanged man, after getting him down. 
1. Kim performs autopsy
2. More talk with inland

title: Open trash container
description: There's a locked trash container behind the Whirling-in-Rags. The manager, Garte, should have a key. Alternatively, you could use brute force to pry the lid open. You just need a prybar.

title: Interview the Wild Pines rep
description: Find the representative of the logistics company who owns the harbour, and ask her about the murder. She should be around here somewhere...

title: Interview the Union boss
description: Enter the harbour and seek an audience with the local Débardeur's Union leader, Evrart Claire -- you need to ask him about the murder in his District.

title: Perform field autopsy
description: The hanged man is down. Perform a closer inspection of his body, arriving at cause of death. This will need a form to be filled, in three parts.

title: Find out who is in the Union box
description: Garte has told you some unruly Union men gather in the mess hall of the Whirling-in-Rags. They're not there today, but most likely they'll eventually show up -- keep an eye out for them.

title: Speak to the assault victim
description: Go upstairs and knock on the door #3 to talk to the supposed victim of the hanged man. See what she has to say to you.

title: Ask about Ruby in the village
description: Titus said Ruby -- the instigator of the lynching -- has a shack she rents on the coast. First go across the waterlock (south of Martinaise), then walk down the coast until you find a little fishing village. Ask around, the locals must have seen her.

title: Return to the Whirling-in-Rags
description: Return to the Whirling after the whole Instigator debacle. Someone there has something to answer to.

title: Go to the island
description: Go to the islet in the bay. There could be a boat in the fishing village, on the coast. Ask there.

title: Run the number on the victim's armour
description: You discovered a serial number on the victim's ceramic armour boots. Run the number using Lieutenant Kitsuragi's shortwave in his motor carriage.

title: PIER ORB / yellow boat
description: The belly of this boat shines like it was recently painted.

title: PIER ORB / street sign south
description: Rue de Saint-Ghislaine -> Roundabout North

title: PIER ORB / plaque
description: Docking reserved for residents of: Rue de Saint-Ghislaine 33A

title: PIER ORB / post in water
description: Looks like there was more construction here -- once, decades ago.

title: PIER ORB / street sign north
description: Capeside Apartments

title: Find your paperwork
description: Officers of the RCM carry a ledger with paperwork -- find yours so you'd be able to take official notes. Look around the yard. Something makes you think it's there.

title: PIER ORB / inland beautiful
description: Shadows on the water... green plants under the calm surface.

title: SEAFORT / CUNO FUEL barks
description: Cuno reacts to fuel empty if task is on w/ BARK

title: Ask 'Scab Leader' about tattoos
description: Perhaps another mercenary can tell you more about the hanged man's tattoos, the so called 'Scab Leader' at the harbour gates. It won't count as one of the people informing you about the tattoos, but could be... interesting?

title: Spirit is eternal
description: The Horrific Necktie is getting ready for the end game. For the love of god do not remove it till 'the magic' happens.

title: SEAFORT ORB / medicinecabinet
description: An old medicine cabinet, newly stocked with drouamine.

title: PAWNSHOP ORB / grimwoman
description: A bust of a woman. The plaque simply says DEI.

title: FRITTE ORB / windowflowers
description: Yellow roses. Dozens of them. Tulips too.

title: FRITTE ORB / notthesameflowers
description: The yellow roses in the window -- those aren't the flowers that were left for Klaasje.

title: FRITTE ORB / noentry
description: The sign says: 'Employees Only.'

title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / undonedishes
description: The dishes are drying. They smell of chemicals and pine trees.

title: WHIRLING F1 / cuttingboard
description: The tomatoes are so thinly sliced, you can see through them.

title: EVART ORB / swordfishclock
description: A taxidermy fish that tells time.

title: APT ORB / drugsinbox
description: A blister pack of medicine peeks out of the box. You should take it!

title: BACKYARD / KIM BREAKING AND ENTERING barks
description: Kim bark after you enter the Communist Student room

title: APT ORB / bathroomdrugs
description: Mammi Mia! JACKPOT!

title: APT ORB / pathtonextroom
description: Someone has torn down the wall.

title: DOOMED S1 ORB / collapsedwall
description: The wall collapsed. It's inaccessible now.

title: DOOMED S1 / KIM WEAPON CACHE barks
description: Spoken when entering the hidden weapon cache with Kim

title: DOOMED F2 ORB / gymposter
description: The poster says: '*Citius* *Fortis*...' The rest is worn off.

title: BOARDWALK ORB / steelbeams
description: The central support beam has been destroyed by artillery fire.

title: BOARDWALK ORB / stonesfall
description: Stones fall. It's a long way down...

title: LAIR ORB / furniture
description: Antiquated office furniture. Last-century, maybe?

title: LAIR ORB / lastcentury
description: Brought down and forgotten, so long ago...

title: LAIR ORB / basementdoor
description: This collapse nearly sealed the basement. One can barely squeeze by.

title: LAIR ORB / overturned
description: This overturned table is covered in orange mildew. Crawling with something...

title: LAIR ORB / darkwater
description: Dark water trails into the distance. There is no way out.

title: LAIR ORB / giantpipe
description: A concrete pipe, buried in sand and dust.

title: LAIR ORB / somethinghere
description: It feels... strange.

title: LAIR ORB / buzzingworsens
description: It's getting louder, the buzzing sound...

title: LAIR ORB / doortorevolution
description: In the beam of the flashlight -- a crevice in the wall...

title: LAIR ORB / dustyglass
description: A series of thick, dusty panes of glass.

title: LAIR ORB / wiresinglass
description: A brief convo with Interfacing about the times they made computer parts with glass

title: COAST ORB / redchair
description: You see a dark red chair in the dim light of the room.

title: COAST ORB / redchairconvo
description: The Red Chair Dialogue with Inland Empire.

title: COAST ORB / windyplanks
description: A cold breeze is enough to make the wall planks creak.

title: PLAZA ORB / trashtutorialone
description: There are bottles inside. You could pick them up if you had a bag!

title: PLAZA ORB / trashtutorialtwo
description: If you had a bag in your hand, perhaps you could collect these bottles and sell them.

title: PLAZA ORB / hiddenhangover
description: A stash of hangover medication!

title: APT ORB / comebacklater
description: Just a door. Nothing for you here right now.

title: CONTAINERYARD ORB / wildpinescargo
description: White pine trees are printed onto the screen covering. Looks like a forest under snow.

title: CONTAINERYARD ORB / unionlogo
description: The banner sags under the weight of rain and snow: white waves on red.

title: COAST ORB / pylonpowerbox
description: A breaker box to power the radio pylon above you. Maybe there's something inside?

title: COAST ORB / doorforevershut
description: It's not only shut -- it's filled with concrete. No getting in here.

title: COAST ORB / wordsonsign
description: The sign says: "No Entry." Someone's scribbled an inverted star on it.

title: COAST ORB / swingpaint
description: Paint peels from the swing set in coin-sized flakes.

title: COAST ORB / bigblockades
description: Ahead: decades old concrete defences. Children play on them now.

title: COAST ORB / hearinggrove
description: Birds in the birch tree -- barely audible coos come from above.

title: COAST ORB / footprintsinsnow
description: Footprints in the snow. They lead away from the accident.

title: COAST ORB / brokenwindowdust
description: You see dust covered linens. Dried tulips on a bed.

title: COAST ORB / spinningtyre
description: A creaking ahead -- a broken axle grinding.

title: COAST ORB / theshot
description: The shot couldn't have come from here. Trees block the way.

title: COAST ORB / bushestoothick
description: The bushes are too thick and thorny to pass through.

title: COAST ORB / whettingstone
description: A whetting stone, well worn and covered in rust.

title: COAST ORB / jettycreak
description: The planks creak beneath your weight.

title: JAM ORB / cigaretteunlock
description: Stop. Between those trucks down there -- smokes. Go get 'em!

title: LAIR ORB / cookingpot
description: Cooking utensils. She has prepared herself porridge with bananas.

title: LAIR ORB / collapsedpath
description: The tunnel collapsed. You'll have to find another way around.

title: LAIR ORB / flashlight
description: It's so dark. Time to get out the flashlight.

title: PAWNSHOP ORB / cashregister
description: Some kind of machine. An antique cash register?

title: EVRART ORB / stairsup
description: A stair made of pallets leading up...

title: EVRART ORB / coffeeday
description: The coffee in the giant thermoses is still lukewarm.

title: CHURCH ORB / forkedpattern
description: More of the forked lightning pattern you saw outside.

title: CHURCH ORB / frostwindow
description: A figure drawn in frost on the window, depicting a deer.

title: CHURCH ORB / paneofglass
description: A cracked pane of glass.

title: HQ ORB / windowview
description: You see the waves, the sea, a church...

title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / schematics
description: Schematics for a pinball machine -- futurism themed.

title: JAM ORB / buttersigndown
description: Butter sign down!

title: JAM ORB / tiretrackstoroof
description: Tyre tracks leading onto the roof. The slush and rain has almost washed them off.

title: WALKWAY ORB / watertankfinal
description: Collecting rainwater.

title: CONTAINERYARD ORB / coffeestuff
description: Industrial sized thermos. Smells like burnt coffee.

title: COAST ORB / radiorelayfinished
description: The radio relay hums with electricity.

title: COAST ORB / cannotpassfence
description: The fence blocks the path. No way on from here.

title: COAST ORB / redtarp
description: Vagrants have recently painted the tarp red. Water drips from it.

title: COAST ORB / tribalpaint
description: More tribalistic markings -- this post is covered in little humanoids.

title: COAST ORB / poleinice
description: A pole screwed into the ice keeps the tent erect.

title: COAST ORB / landfill
description: Trash from some unending party.

title: SEAFORT ORB / blossomingallaround
description: Small white flowers blossom all around you...

title: SEAFORT ORB / lastdinghy
description: A rubber dinghy. It's deflated, broken.

title: CONTAINERYARD ORB / cranethought
description: KVALSUND means *Whale Fjord* in Ardan.

title: SEAFORT INT ORB / anthologies
description: Books. Mostly *fantastique* and historical fiction.

title: SEAFORT INT ORB / rangefinder
description: You see candles planted on a broken rangefinder.

title: CHURCH ORB / chalkboard
description: The blackboard is filled with complex equations. They look recent.

title: CHURCH ORB / chalkboard interfacing
description: Something to do with radio frequencies?

title: CHURCH ORB / easy inland
description: A strange stillness fills you as you look ahead. You should *walk* here, not run.

title: CHURCH ORB / wooden figure
description: This grotesque wooden figure looks half-finished.

title: CHURCH ORB / figure inland
description: Feels like it's trying to become one with the church.

title: CHURCH ORB / figure concept
description: This figure was added later. It's not part of the original church.

title: CHURCH ORB / reel-to-reel tapes
description: Two decks of reel-to-reel tapes spinning on empty.

title: CHURCH ORB / more tapes
description: A portable Harmon Wowshi tape recorder.

title: CHURCH ORB / shivers
description: Cold wind blows in from the broken gallery... makes your skin crawl.

title: CHURCH ORB / window
description: Frost has drawn flowers on the glass, obscuring the view.

title: CHURCH ORB / pews
description: A prayer book has been left open.

title: CHURCH ORB / pews concept
description: Excerpts from the Perikarnassian litany of love.

title: CHURCH ORB / chemistry lab
description: This looks like a tiny chemistry lab.

title: CHURCH ORB / drug lab realization
description: What's happening here?

title: CHURCH ORB / nosaphed
description: Those Nosaphed bottles...

title: CHURCH ORB / distilled water
description: Tanks of distilled water.

title: CHURCH ORB / knew about drug lab
description: Cool, so this is where they've set up the drug lab.

title: CHURCH ORB / pews composure
description: A strange taste on your lips. Like blood -- or strawberries.

title: CHURCH ORB / more tapes logic
description: Is it possible it's... *recording* something?

title: APT ORB / bathroom smell
description: Expensive men's perfume lingers in the air.

title: APT ORB / painting
description: An old photo of the same apartment, dated year '01.

title: APT ORB / dishes
description: Dishes soaked up in a pot.

title: APT ORB / takeaway food
description: Old takeaway food boxes.

title: APT ORB / ashtray
description: An empty ashtray.

title: APT ORB / notes on fridge
description: Dates for open lectures at a local university.

title: APT ORB / flyers on fridge
description: Flyers for underground parties.

title: APT ORB / sadness empathy
description: A tinge of sadness -- this is a kids' room...

title: APT ORB / clock
description: The clock is ticking away with an odd cheerfulness.

title: APT ORB / clock concept
description: Its ticking makes you anxious. Rings hollow in the room.

title: APT ORB / balcony door
description: Cold is rushing in through the uninsulated balcony door.

title: APT ORB / heights
description: A chalk-drawn height chart for children's growth over the years.

title: APT ORB / red astra reaction
description: The same brand of cigarettes you found in the trash next to the deceased.

title: Close the water lock on Wednesday
description: To get to the coast you need to use the panel to close the water lock. It's been blocked, pending repairs, which should be done by Wednesday morning. (This will open up a new area in Martinaise.)

title: APT / smoker door orb
description: #28 -- A door to be remembered...

title: VILLAGE / POSSE 3
description: the end where you ask your final questions.

title: PIER ORB / joyce gone note
description: *Went to the village on the coast, officer. See you there! -- Joyce* says the note on the post.

title: Ask Kim to tell you about the case
description: Police officers get *briefed* about the cases they're given. Sometimes they *forget* the briefing, though, and need to be briefed again! Click on Kim and ask him about the case.

title: JAM / PALEDRIVER
description: A small, old, shrivelled up mesque woman with thinning hair sits awkwardly on the ledge of a lorry. An empty, glazed look adorns her eyes. She murmurs while nodding her head to the music coming from a radio in her lorry cabin. She wears a squared truck-driver flannel shirt with sleeves wrapped up to her elbows and blue denim dungarees tucked in yellow-brown (Caterpillar) boots.

title: VILLAGE ORB / halogen watermarks village
description: This is the village version of halogen watermarks, in front of kineema there

title: Inspect the window in Klaasje's bedroom
description: Go to her room, search it once more. Upstairs, in the bedroom -- the window. Perhaps it will yield *something*?

title: VILLAGE ORB / ask boat from netpicker
description: You should ask the owner before you take this boat to the island.

title: SEAFORT INT ORB / slit wind blowing
description: Cold air seeps in through the embrasure.

title: SEAFORT DREAM ORB / on beach
description: Go down to the chain, there's something there...

title: SEAFORT DREAM ORB / in water
description: Further...

title: Discover a new species
description: Find the cryptid called the *Insulindian phasmid* in Martinaise -- confirm its existence.

title: SEAFORT ORB / oh god
description: Oh god...

title: Find pyrholidon and slurp it
description: There is an extra special *fourth* substance in Martinaise, that no one talks about. Find it, slurp it. You may even start noticing bottles tucked away in Martinaise once you've seen one in your hand.

title: Prove your authority to Titus Hardie
description: You have to gain authority in Titus' eyes for the investigation to advance. Soften him up first. Maybe investigate the crime scene, or the body? Look for a witness? Get help from the Union boss, or the company rep? Tie them to any other crimes?

title: FRITTE ORB / radio plays
description: A melancholy pop song plays on the radio.

title: Look for Ruby on the coast
description: Ruby was in the cinderblock village but left Monday. She could be anywhere on the peninsula, north of the village. Look inside the church. Ask around, there are people to the west of the mural. Or, I don't know... ask a girl on a date? Then ask her? Ask the wind maybe?

title: HQ ORB / bedwithkim
description: Nice bed. You could sleep here -- later, once night has come.

title: The pissing competition
description: Apparently there was a pissing match between Precinct 41 (yours) and Precinct 57 (Kim's). Ask Kim about this after the initial inspection of the dead body is done.

title: WHIRLING F1 / union box wall
description: Photos of men in overalls, toting guns and Union placards.

title: WHIRLING F1 / hardie window clicked
description: You see hawthorn bushes outside. Hmm...

title: COAST ORB / summer house swing
description: The swing is missing -- no one's been here for a long time.

title: COAST ORB / living under the boat
WHIRLING F2 ORB / bath
description: You see bottles in the bathtub: wine, beer and sweet liqueurs.

title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / MONEY
description: There's something on the table...

title: DOOMED F2 / door closed
description: The store on the other side is closed for the night. Come back tomorrow?

title: DOOMED F2 ORB / dice
description: This tray is full of dice -- colourful polyhedral dice. Hundreds of them.

title: DOOMED F2 ORB / container
description: The candy dispenser has been repurposed to contain thousands of dice.

title: BOOKSTORE ORB / sports mags
description: Old sports magazines, tucked away in a dark corner.

title: Find the bullet before you get fooled
description: It is possible to determine the real cause of the hanged man's death -- before it's too late. You've just done it!

title: PIER ORB / cormoran
description: A lonely cormorant surveys the sea, indifferent to your approach.

title: BACKYARD ORB / witness logic
description: That smoker up there could be a witness. Talk to him.

title: PIER ORB / paint origin
description: There's a girl up there -- did she spill the paint?

title: WHIRLING ROOF ORB / coffee cup
description: Cold coffee and an ashtray that looks like a hedgehog.

title: BACKYARD ORB / twentyeight afterthought
description: Complete silence. Whoever lives here isn't home.

title: COAST ORB / gloria
description: "Glory," says the graffito, "to the ghosts of us!"

title: COAST ORB / window hearing
description: Inside you hear the cosy sound of some kind of heater, sputtering.

title: VILLAGE / lily door closed
description: This door is closed for today. Time to put the kids to sleep.

title: COAST ORB / black swallow
description: A little black swallow circles above you. You hear it chirrup.

title: COAST ORB / motor carriage tire
description: The rear tyre of a motor carriage adorns these reeds.

title: COAST ORB / tire encyclo
description: That's a Noland 'Vingt-Cinq', an unsuccessful model.

title: COAST ORB / tire empathy

description: This section of the coast hasn't been used in decades.

description: People paid money to park here? No one would pay now...

title: COAST ORB / phone afterthought
description: You can imagine why. Calls become *terrible* sometimes.

title: COAST ORB / motor carriage tire
description: The wheel of a motor carriage has been discarded in the reeds.

title: COAST ORB / tire empathy
description: Relax, it's not yours. Not every crashed MC is yours. (Hopefully.)

description: A Noland 'Vingt-Cinq', an unpopular model from the Thirties.

title: COAST ORB / canister elchem
description: Moonshine probably. Smells like tasty fermentation.

title: BOARDWALK / coin op vertigo
description: Stop messing with the coin-viewer and hold on to something. The wind is so strong...

title: COAST ORB / clicked three
description: This is someone's home away from home. Just like yours.

title: CHURCH ORB / pattern idea
description: Bark beetles? No, it looks intentional. Some long forgotten style.

title: CHURCH ORB / spiderweb
description: A spider has spun its web around this wood-carved pillar.

title: COAST ORB / engine inside
description: The building before you housed the engine. Must have been a big one.

description: This relay tower coordinates boat traffic in the bay -- barely.

title: LAIR ORB / clean foodstuff
description: These pots and plates are full of dust and spider-webs.

title: COAST ORB / snow shivers tutorial
description: You should come back here when it snows... A strange feeling. It passes quickly.

title: WHIRLING F2 / note orb
description: Looks like she's left something on the table...

title: SEAFORT ORB / tire bumpers
description: These tyres are falling apart. They're at least 50 years old.

title: SEAFORD INT ORB / big blast door
description: This great blast door must weigh over 10 tons. Rust peels off it.

title: SEAFORT ORB / leaky barell afterthought
description: Not enough fuel. You'll have to look elsewhere.

title: SEAFORT ORB/ dream water
description: You see her footprints on the water...

title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / leg hurts dont run
description: Ouch, that leg hurts... maybe if you don't *run* it'll be okay?

title: TEST / END TITLES TEST FOR ROZZO
INVENTORY / DOCUMENTS
description: Interaction with the documents Evrart asks you to sign.

title: Ask the pétanque player about may bells
description: The old guy in the uniform playing pétanque on the plaza -- he looks like a war veteran. Maybe he can tell you something about the may bells. Show them to him.

title: YARD / CUNOESSE postbody barks
description: Cunoesse barking at Cuno from behind the fence

title: YARD / CUNO postbody barks
description: Cuno squats on the ground, high on speed.

description: You ask René about crater and get the streamlined history lesson without any messy checks or hubs within hubs withing hubs. Sweet and short.

title: PLAZA / GASTON rene dead barks
description: René has passed away and Gaston is sitting on a bench.

title: Ask René about the photo
description: The photo you found in the nightwatchman's booth -- the one with a happy couple. Ask René about it, he looked uncharacteristically happy in the picture.

title: Find the armoured gloves
description: The gloves of the hanged man armour might still be around in the neighbourhood. Try to locate them.

title: VILLAGE / LILLY SANDCASTLE
description: This is the interaction dialogue with Lilly's Little Sandcastle, where she hid the gloves.

description:
THE PIGS

Current Red Check

title: Do not talk to René and Gaston
description: You'll get so much more police work done, if you don't waste time chatting with old men. Just leave these two to their game.

description: Quick attempt to catch the fishing rod...

description: This hatch is jammed shut.

description: Walk slow. It might be dangerous...

description: No way to jump down here without breaking a few bones.

description: You can't see into the house from this angle.

title: COAST ORB / windownetpicker

description: What are *these* doing in the fish?

description: There's something stashed beneath the boat.

description: Convo with Logic about the scene of the party

description: Rain has washed up the foundations and it's melting away in the sea breeze.

description: The door is not only barred shut -- it is inaccessible.

description: There's absolutely no way in through this door.

description: Could this be the buoy Klaasje told you about?

title: COAST ORB / northboathouse
description: No boat in the boat house today.

description: These soggy logs smell of ignition fluid -- still they won't light up.

description: Tiny cages, carefully constructed.

title: COAST ORB /  -- smasheddome
description: Someone must have worked hard to smash the plastic dome.

description: Tiny inlets there -- off in the far distance, where the posts trail toward...

title: COAST ORB / feldwindowsgreenorb
description: Glass windows of gigantic proportion.

title: COAST ORB / anotherbreakerbox

title: COAST ORB / emptyfuelcannister
description: A big wine canister -- it's open and empty.
