description: The floorboards creak.

title: DOOMED F2 ORB / shoes logic
description: Does someone live here?

title: INVENTORY / NOTE FROM THE FRIDGE
description: Read the note you found from the giant ice bear fridge in the doomed commercial area.

title: Find your heraldic bird
description: The working class woman said that you're a bit of a cockatoo. What if it's true? Go read up on cockatoos in the bookstore, maybe you'll discover something new about yourself as well.

title: INVENTORY / COCKATOO
description: From A to Zrieek! Guide to a Well-Behaved Cockatoo. After you have bought it. (Helen)

title: WHIRLING F1 / KARAOKE STAND
description: Sing karaoke!

title: PIER / CINDY
description: You run across an aspiring graffito artist. She can serve as an introduction to Joyce, and also tells you a little about crime in Martinaise. You can get a brush from her to use on the mother of all walls, and an idea for what to use as paint.

title: INVENTORY / FRACTURED BULLET
description:
By inspecting the bullet, you can find out that:
1. The bullet came from a breech-loaded rifle.
2. The bullet was shot from some distance, so this was probably not a mercy kill (white check.)
3. The rifle used was a model mass-produced during the revolutionary war, and the surplus rifles/ammo are still a favourite with third-world guerrillas and Jamrock bangers.

title: WESTCOAST / MORELL barks
description: Morell checks to see if Gary is doing something useful.

title: WESTCOAST / GARY barks
description: Gary pretends to be doing something useful.

title: COAST ORB / reeds by camp site
description: These reeds are by Morell and Gary's abandoned camp site. The interactable reeds you can search when Morell tells you to check the phasmid traps. There are traps in these reeds.

title: GARYS APARTMENT / COLONIAL MUG COLLECTION
description: You examine Gary's racist mugs.

title: GARYS APARTMENT ORB / man from hjelmdall poster
description: Whoever lives here admires fair-haired fantasy heroes with big muscles.

title: GARYS APARTMENT ORB / book on phasmids
description: A book titled "The Hidden World of Walking Sticks" lies open.

title: GARYS APARTMENT ORB / disinfectant
description: The smell of disinfectant in the room. Smells like chemicals.

title: GARYS APARTMENT ORB / suitcase
description: A small suitcase full of clothes. Guests are staying over?

title: GARYS APARTMENT / KIM barks
description: Kim tells you he's not comfortable being there.

title: WHIRLING F1 / KIM FIRST VISIT barks
description: Kim doesn't like pinball.

title: WHIRLING F3 / BARRED DOOR INSIDE
description: From the inside, the door opens easily.

title: WHIRLING F3 ORB / gutted pinball machine
description: The pinball machine has been taken apart and gutted.

title: WHIRLING F3 ORB / boxes
description: Small windows, taped shut with black plastic. You can't see outside.

title: WHIRLING / BATHTUB
description: You can take a bath and wash that corpse stench off.

title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / note about key
description: A note: "NB! The spare key is tied to the bush outside the corner room window!"

title: KIM SWITCH / END OF DAY
description: Kim wants to call it a day.

title: YARD ORB / winch
description: This winch mechanism has been oxidizing for some years.

title: YARD / HANGED MAN BOOTS
description: If Kim is not there, you can take off the boots once the body is down.

title: THOUGHT / FAIRWEATHER T-500
description: Visual Calculus wants you to research Enemy Technology. Get it after equipping any piece of the dead man's armour.

title: KINEEMA / SERIAL NUMBER
description:
1. Ask Alice to run the serial number you got from the boot.
2. Come back the next day to get results and ask for Alice to try to get more personal info on the mercenary (finish task to run serial number, gain task to get personal info from serial number).
3. Come back the next day to get personal info (finish task to get personal info from serial number).

title: EVRART ORB / fishing rod
description: This is not a fishing rod, is it? It's...

title: LAIR / INSTIGATORS TENT
description:
1. Find Ruby's journal here.
2. Use to stow away Ruby's body if she killed herself.

title: LAIR / INSTIGATOR
description:
You are caught in the ray of the Pale Compressor and talk to Ruby. You can:
1. Ask about the Compressor.
2. Ask about the murder and why Ruby went into hiding.
3. Try to destroy the Compressor.
4. Try to stop Ruby from killing herself if you destroy the Compressor.
5. Let Ruby go.

title: LAIR ORB / beware inland empire
description: There's something in the air, an unnatural buzzing.

title: LAIR ORB / beware shivers
description: A dialogue with Pain Threshold foreshadowing end game.

title: BOARDWALK / FELD MURAL
description:
1. Observe the mural.
2. Shivers White Check to see stairs, which then allows you to use the ladder to get to the roof.

title: BOARDWALK / LADDER
description: Savoir Faire White Check to climb up.

title: LAIR / KIM DOOR barks
description: Kim wants you to let him in.

title: LAIR ORB / shelves
description: Old file folders in the cart, documents silvery with mould.

title: LAIR / KRAS MAZOV PORTRAIT
description:
This portrait is covered in cobwebs. You can:
1. Compare to weapons cache.
2. Learn about Mazov.
3. React depending on political persuasion.
4. Speculate about who may have stayed here (foreshadows deserter).

title: LAIR ORB / bunker pamphlets
description: Revolutionary propaganda on the bunk bed: ancient flyers and brochures.

title: LAIR ORB / bunker bunk bed
description: Stale fabric smell and dust. No one's slept here in months, maybe years.

title: LAIR ORB / footprints
description: Boot prints in the sand. One of the soles appears more worn than the other.

title: BOARDWALK ORB / littered paper
description: Just some old invoices -- everything valuable was looted long ago.

title: BOARDWALK ORB / broken glass
description: The glass is covered with grime and dust. You can barely see out.

title: LAIR ORB / slit window
description: You can see the beach through this slit window.

title: LAIR ORB / shot viscal
description: You decide that the shot that killed the merc couldn't have come from this bunker.

title: LAIR ORB / slit window 2
description: The same slit window you saw from the outside.

title: INVENTORY / RUBY'S JOURNAL
description: Here you can learn about Ruby's involvement with La Puta Madre.

title: LAIR / INSTIGATOR CASE
description: Here you can present your case to Ruby and find yourself left without much of a case.

title: LIFELINE / HEART ATTACK
description: When you lose enough Health (Endurance), you have a heart attack. This is the freebie/tutorial.

title: LIFELINE / GIVING UP
description: When you lose enough Morale (Volition), you feel like giving up. This is the freebie/tutorial.

title: GARYS APARTMENT / DOOR
description: You can open this door when you get the key from Manana.

title: SHACK ORB / locust city
description: It's crawling with locusts in here!

title: SHACK ORB / locust city logic
description: Cuno must have taken the locusts from the trap. Get task to confront him.

title: Return Lena's pin
description: Lena gave you a commemorative pin to pawn when you were desperate for cash. The *honourable* thing to do would be to return it to her -- buy it back and return it to her once you have money.

title: Pay Lena back for pin
description: Lena gave you a commemorative pin to pawn when you were desperate for cash. You could pay her back once your financial situation isn't quite as pitiful. Finished when you give Lena what the pawnbroker paid you for the pin.

title: Get a reality lowdown
description: You have no idea where you are. Lena encouraged you to ask others to explain the world to you in greater detail -- perhaps try a rich person? Rich people are educated.

title: JAM / COALITION WARSHIP ARCHER -- SOONA VERSION
description: CUTSCENE where you attempt to contact Coalition Warship Archer with SOONA. PART OF THE MORALIST DREAM QUEST

title: PLAZA / PISSFLAUBERT AND FTW
description: Near Kineema, two young gentlemen wishing to introduce Martinaise to the SKULLS brand are idling away, looking at the beast of a motor carriage. It is possible to get their jackets if you succeed the red check.

title: CONTAINERYARD / RICH GUY CONTAINER DOOR
description: Here be the container door with which you converse good Sir, getting rhetorical awards you the ability to *drum-roll* enter the container!

title: CONTAINERYARD / LIGHT BENDING GUY
description: Dialogue with a man so rich that light literally bends around his face.

title: CHURCH / STAINED GLASS WINDOW VISCAL
description: Viscal concerning the stained glass window. You can put important things together.

title: DOOMED F2 ORB / slipstreamblades
description: Steel rotor blades bearing a "Slipstream" logo.

title: BOOKSTORE / PARANORMAL
description: Shelf of paranormal books.

title: BOOKSTORE ORB / balconythought
description: Must be Jan Kaus again.

title: JAM ORB / fuckoffafterthought
description: Afterthought dialogue if you told the lorry driver to fuck off.

title: DOOMED F2 ORB / conceptstream
description: Slipstream conceptualizing

title: DOOMED F2 ORB / taxidermy
description: Wild animals stare at you in the dark, stuffed and mounted.

title: DOOMED F2 ORB / mannequin
description: A naked mannequin torso. A strange yellow colour.

title: DOOMED F2 ORB / windowslogic
description: Looks like the remains of the "24h Window" repair shop.

title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / summerdoor
description: Summer door closed for the winter.

title: WHIRLING / MONEYMAN barks
description: A wildly succesful barking moneyman exclaims lots of comments about money.

title: DOOMED F2 / BACK DOOR
description: It's the back door of "Crime, Romance, and Biographies of Famous People", if you come from THE OTHER SIDE, from inside the Doomed Commercial Area.

title: KIM SWITCH / LORRY CONCLUSIONS
description: A post-lorry-search dialogue with Kim, going over the necessary information and coming to some conclusions.

title: ICE / ACELE AND ASSOCIATES
description: this is where the "ask about acele's associates" and "what's your name" branches are located.

title: ICE / ACELE ON ICE
description: this is where the "recording device", "what are you doing here on the ice?" and "questioning" branches are located.

title: ICE / ACELE CHURCH STUFF
description: this is where "the drug lab plan conclusion", "what did you see in the church" and "what's your plan for the church" branches are located

title: Help ravers start a nightclub
description: The ravers asked you to help turn the church into a dance club, but there are already some people inside. Find out who those people are and what they want.

title: ICE / ANDRE TENT CONTENT
description: this is where andre's dialogues about the "church/padlock", "who are inside the church" and "tent equipment" are.

title: ICE / ANDRE WHITE CHECKS
description: this is where andre's two white checks are -- "try to logic and figure out what they're hiding/planning" and "JUST DANCE"

title: YARD / CUNODOOR
description: it's the door to Cuno's shack (an empty interactable node to get it working programming-wise)

title: Sync the sines with Noid
description: Noid doesn't want to talk to you, the sines are not in sync. Guess you need to help him and his friends out somehow, prove that you're one of the crew. Who knows what he'll tell you?

title: KIM SWITCH / FIGHT FAILURE
description: Kim's reaction to You trying to punch Measurehead and failing at it.

title: Solve the Egg Head puzzle
description: There has to be some way to talk to this person, you just haven't found it yet. (It's definitely not about sines.) What if you just try again, find your way out of this maze of things to say?

title: CANAL / HAWTHORN
description: The hawthorn tree on Rue de Saint-Ghislaine. A reel of bronze magnetic tape is caught in its branches. It's a part of Egg Head's "make the music harder core" task. Interfacing White Check to get it.

title: Confront Hardie boys about drug trade
description: A person present at the lynching is also involved with the drug trade through the harbour, which links them to Hardie's boys. See what Titus has to say about it.

title: Get Acele to talk about her associates
description: Acele refused to talk about her friends. Maybe she'll open up later -- after you've helped them set up the nightclub.

title: ICE / KIM POST TENT barks
description: Kim barks after you have RETURNETH from the TENT.

title: ICE / KIM CHURCH barks
description: Kim reacts to the church getting shot up by the police a few months ago. Creates question option in Kim Main Dialogue.

title: CHURCH ORB / shards of dei
description: A cracked pane of glass, colourful.

title: CHURCH ORB / shards viscal
description: It came from the stained glass window. Still has letters on it too...

title: CHURCH ORB / waterbasin afterthought
description: Could these wires work as contact microphones?

title: CHURCH ORB / cone of silence
description: EVERYTHING IS SILENT HERE VERY SPOOKY SCENE YES INDEED WHOLE SCENE ABOUT LOOKING UP AND THEN TIAGO APPEARS, BOOM!

title: VILLAGE / IDIOT DOOM SPIRAL
description: Idiot Doom Spiral Guy welcomes the return of Tequila Sunset! Tells the story of how you drove the car into the sea and drank with these drunks, and other tales of everything (in exchange of alcohol): cocaine skull, headless falnrider etc.

title: HQ ORB / orc heater
description: This intricate heat engine hums quietly, giving out pleasant warmth.

title: HQ ORB / new home shivers
description: A shivers afterthought appears after you've clicked through the other orbs available inside the shack. It's a discussion of how it feels to have a new centre of operations, a free home

title: HQ ORB / wallstuff
description: Old science fiction magazines. Books about birdwatching. An almanac from '39.

title: HQ ORB / heater ency thought
description: Using a thermodynamic expander-condenser cycle... nice.

title: CHURCH ORB / inland rockwell
description: Feels like there's someone above you, watching you from the dark.

title: NETHOUSE ORB / home smell
description: A faint scent of cinnamon still lingers in the air.

title: NETHOUSE ORB / fireplace
description: Industrial coal pellets burn with an orange glow.

title: NETHOUSE ORB / fireplace phasmid
description: You think the fire iron is a phasmid.

title: VILLAGE / LITTLE LILY
description: One of Netpicker's kids not running around in the village, instead she sits on the sofa. You can exchange a few words with her.

title: VILLAGE / LILIENNES TWINS barks
description: Two of Netpicker's kids standing around in the village, shuffling on their feet, kicking rocks and yelling barks or somesuch.

title: VILLAGE ORB / rooftop
description: Words have been painted on the roof of the building.

title: VILLAGE ORB / aerograffito afterthought
description: Conceptualization afterthought about the words on the roof!

title: BOARDWALK / WCH
description: Dead working class husband who has fallen through the blanks and cut himself open and it's generally a very gruesome and sad death.

title: NETHOUSE ORB / home smell reaction
description: It feels safe and warm in here -- not like outside.

title: THOUGHT / COACH PHYSICAL INSTRUMENT
description: Physical Instrument is really adamant about yelling at you. something-something triggers the thought

title: Hardie and the Pigs
description: Ask Titus Hardie and his boys to take care of the Pigs -- the woman catatonic on the boardwalk. It's their district, their mess -- their responsibility.

title: BOARDWALK ORB / rotting lobster pots
description: The lingering stench of rotting lobster pots.

title: BOARDWALK ORB / gut slime
description: Dried-up gut-slime and fish scales coat the floorboards.

title: WALKWAY ORB / party scene afterthought
description: Someone either had the most depressing solo-party... or there's a sequence killer on the loose.

title: Ask Evrart about Acele and the drug lab
description: Acele said Evrart is connected to the drug operation in the church. Maybe you can use this to manipulate him.

title: INVENTORY / HJELMDALLERMANN
description: Hjelmdallermann: the Man from Hjelmdall. A latter introductory book for beginners.

title: WHIRLING F2 / DREAM 2 INTRO
description:
1. You try to get comfortable, but the bed is less than ideal.
2. You begin to drift off, but have trouble getting to sleep.

title: WHIRLING F2 / DREAM 2 HANGED MAN
description:
1. You have a conversation with the hanged man dressed in your disco outfit.
2. You find out that you have failed Elysium.
THE CORRECT VERSION

title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / speed hangover
description: Electrochemistry informs you that you're low on amphetamines in your bloodstream.

title: DAYCHANGE / TEQUILA BED
description: The dialogue between You and your bed. You can sleep, not sleep, read your ledger.

title: WHIRLING F2 / BLACKOUT DREAM
description: Dreamless sleep, finally!

title: SHACK ORB / magnesolam
description: An empty tube of *Magnesolam* magnesium supplement.

title: SHACK ORB / magnesolam encyclo
description: A magnesium supplement you rub on your chest to live a happy magnesium-rich life.

title: SHACK ORB / silverplate
description: A silver plate with traces of bone yellow powder.

title: SHACK ORB / poster get out
description: The poster says: GET OUT OF THE WAY -- OR GET FUCKED UP!

title: SHACK ORB / pighead
description: Cured pig's head. It looks mummified.

title: SHACK ORB / poster get out inland
description: That's actually a FALN slogan, from an aggressive youth oriented campaign.

title: INVENTORY / PALE MEDICINE
description: Medicinal Purposes of the Pale.

title: INVENTORY / MULLEN IDENTITY
description: "Dick Mullen and the Mistaken Identity". Dick Mullen is mistaken for someone (an identity).

title: INVENTORY / BAD ROMANCE
description: Excrutiating Love Story book. Graad-y black-and-white-rainbow book. Ends with lensgrinder in somewhere. "Sixteen Days in Coldest April." something thought it was a romance book, but its misplaced.

title: INVENTORY / SUZERAINTY GAME
description: Information about: colonies of Revachol.

title: GATES ORB / electroentrance
description: A hermetically sealed door. Locked by electronic means.

title: INITIATION / ALCOHOL HABIT
description: A thought for becoming an alcoholic.

title: INITIATION / PYRHOLIDON HABIT
description: A thought for becoming a wonderful pyrholidon addict.

title: INITIATION / SMOKING HABIT
description: Global afterthought dialogue to pick up smoking.

title: BACKYARD ORB / more bullet holes
description: Another splattering of bullet holes on this wall.

title: BACKYARD ORB / water barrels
description: These barrels are half-full of rainwater.

title: BACKYARD ORB / water tower
description: A rickety old water tower.

title: BACKYARD ORB / more bullet thoughts
description: quick comments with kim or not about the other bullet holes in this wall.

title: THOUGHT / ART COP
description: Conceptualization is really interested in your Art Cop ideas

title: OFFICE ORB / strike fliers
description: "EVERY WORKER = MEMBER OF THE BOARD" is written at the top of the flyers.

title: OFFICE ORB / typewriter and lamp setup
description: This is a "Dewy" typewriter -- the model name is on the back.

title: OFFICE ORB / strike fliers logo
description: And at the bottom: the Union logo and "DEMAND DEMOCRACY"!

title: OFFICE ORB / couch2
description: Someone is habitually chilling next to the radio.

title: OFFICE ORB / couch
description: A giant assprint on the pillow and a pattern of coffee rings on the armrest...

title: OFFICE ORB / disconnected phone
description: A combination phone-and-punchclock setup.

title: OFFICE ORB / electroentrance other side
description: The door is locked and cannot be opened from this side without a pass card.

title: OFFICE ORB / locked door afterthought
description: Guess you have no choice but to talk to the Union leader.

title: INVENTORY / CODEX URIK

title: PLAZA / RENE PETANQUE
description: René pétanque-ball RC.

title: PLAZA / RENE CASE MONEY RAT
description: Asking about the case and discussing women.

title: PLAZA / RENE WC HERO STORY
description: Red check to impress René with a hero-story of your own.

title: PLAZA / GASTON CHEATING
description:
* Rat or don't rat out cheating Gaston
* What Game is this?

title: PLAZA / GASTON CASE
description: The Case

title: PLAZA / GASTON SANDWICH WC
description: Sandwich orgy

description:
* Who is Cuno?
* Make amends with Cuno.

description: * Ask Cuno about the hanged man.

description: Ask if Cuno knows a place you could stash the dead body.

title: YARD / CUNO SCENE
description: * Ask Cuno about the yard.

title: Buy FALN pants from Cuno
description: Those FALN track pants looked enticing, but you and Cuno were not *close* yet. You need to figure out what's going on with him and then you can get your hands on some performance gear.

title: Get the whole story from Titus
description: Hardie and the boys know the whole story. It'll be difficult to get it out of him. Have you thoroughly inspected the body? Looked around for a witness? Gotten friendly with the Union boss and the company rep? *Really* gotten to Klaasje?

title: WHIRLING F1 / TITUS ALAIN AND EUGENE
description: Dialogue with Hardie and the surviving boys

title: WHIRLING F1 / EUGENE AND ALAIN
description: A dialogue with Eugene and Alain after Titus got killed in the Tribunal

description: barks for Eugene as Titus did not get shot

title: WHIRLING F1 / Alain barks post tribunal
description: barks of Alain as Titus did not get shot

title: WHIRLING F1 / Alain 2 barks post tribunal
description: barks for Alain if Titus got shit in tribunal

title: WHIRLING F1 / MAN WITH SUNGLASSES ESPRIT RC
description: ESPRIT RED CHECK

title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / vicquemare esprit afterthought

title: VILLAGE / POSSE
description:
It's time to face your colleagues. 

This is the dialogue that autostarts once you step to the villlage square, the others just bark and stand there.

title: Extract a confession from the Deserter
description: You need at least three examples of proof to show that you have him anyway. There is little point in his resistance.

title: COAST / WOMENS RIGHTS second stage barks
description: Barks for WR protester post-mercenary tribunal. The Women's Rights protester is drunk, lying in the sand. He uses the tare drunk/working class drunk idle animation.

title: COAST ORB / protester logic reaction
description: Seems that after the strike the women's rights activist has radicalised and... gotten sloshed.

title: BOOKSTORE ORB / tome comment
description: Everyone knows the most interesting thing about fascists was their magic.

title: WHIRLING F1 / EXIT DOOR
description: this is a crazy-ass exit-from-whirling door, god dammit.

title: WHIRLING F2 / TAPE PLAYER
description: You can click on tape player -- it has broken down while you were gone. Can't listen to any tapes now, best you find a new one from Roy.

title: JAM / TOMMY barks

title: COAST ORB / weighmachine
description: A coin operated weighing machine. Hasn't been used for a decade.

title: COAST ORB / firstfrontwindow
description: Dusty pews in the shadows. Many seem to be missing.

title: COAST ORB / secondfrontwindow
description: An altar shrouded in dark. Or something like that – it’s too dark to tell.

title: COAST ORB / firststack
description: It must have taken a lot of patience to do this.

title: COAST ORB / churchladder
description: From up there, one would have a great view of the ice floes out back.

title: COAST ORB / secondstack
description: Yellow moss on these stones... They're probably stolen from someone's garden.

title: COAST ORB / firstcheerypost
description: Painted with pastels. Someone is trying to bring cheer into the world.

title: COAST ORB / winchbarrel
description: This barrel has been recently discarded. It still smells of fuel oil.

title: COAST ORB / phone
description: A dead phone. A smashed receiver; like someone hung up too hard.

title: COAST ORB / electricthought
description: Buzz. Hum. The electricity flows through the wires with audible power.

title: COAST ORB / redwindow
description: White curtains have been drawn shut. No looking in.

title: COAST ORB / collapsedbridge
description: The beams are splintered. The bridge didn't collapse on its own. Artillery broke it.

title: COAST ORB / bluedoor
description: A door. A building. A hiding place. Could the Instigator be inside?!

title: COAST ORB / bluedoororb
description: Conversation with PhysInt.

title: COAST ORB / forgottenbuild
description: Construction material. Whoever planned to build this house left in a hurry.

title: COAST ORB / floatice
description: The ice bobs up and down, creaking as it rubs against adjacent ice.

title: COAST ORB / seagull
description: There is a seagull flying somewhere along the coast. The area there should have an afterthought orbital.

title: JAM ORB / foreigncar
description: A foreign car. Kept in good condition.

title: PLAZA ORB / plazatilecoat
description: This Shivers initiates the coat quest. It is an Easy check.

title: BOOKSTORE ORB / bookstorerug

title: WALKWAY ORB / walkwaycoat
description: This is the third Shivers in the coat quest. It is a challenging orb.

title: APT ORB / rugcoat
description: This is the fifth Shivers in the coat quest. It is Very Difficult.

title: COAST ORB / blockade
description: These heavy military blockades are riddled with bullet holes, crumbling.

title: SEAFORT ORB / tyreisland
description: To protect boats coming in? But who comes here anymore...

description: It must have been a direct hit to take out such a huge chunk.

title: SEAFORT ORB / plankbridge

title: SEAFORT ORB / missingrails

description: Old building material. Left behind.

title: SEAFORT ORB / dangersign

description: There's a lingering trace of mazut in the air.

title: SEAFORT ORB / inlandentering
description: This is it.

title: SEAFORT ORB / destroyedstairs
description: No way to get up there. The stairs are gone

title: SEAFORT ORB / insidetheruinpeek

title: SEAFORT INT ORB / turningwheel
description: When the wheel moves, the massive machine must move with it.

title: SEAFORT INT ORB / kitchen
description: Dishes stained with sauce and fire. A survivor's kitchen.

title: SEAFORT INT ORB / chairbook
description: A waterlogged book. The pages are drying, but it'll be illegible forever now.

title: SEAFORT INT ORB / telescopetower
description: A specialized telescope. Helps mark the distance to faraway targets.

title: SEAFORT ORB / concretestrip
description: A huge killing structure.

title: SEAFORT ORB / amongthereeds
description: The reeds sway strangely... No, it's nothing.

title: SEAFORT ORB / approachinghouse
description: The house stands -- barely.

title: SEAFORT ORB / killingpoint
description: The pain in your pelvis makes you wince. Then you continue.

title: SEAFORT ORB / waveswashhere
description: The ice cracks under your feet. Be careful not to fall through...

title: SEAFORT ORB / bleuetsviscalc
description: Small bell-shaped flowers are blossoming in the sand. The snow must be weaker.

title: SEAFORT ORB / bleuetsendurance
description: Flowers growing out of the sand, from under the snow. Winter's over soon!

title: SEAFORT ORB / bleuetsinland
description: There are flowers here already in bloom. Winter will be over soon.

title: SEAFORT ORB / bleuetsperceptionsmell
description: The air smells sweet. And scary, somehow.

title: SEAFORT INT ORB / smellofsea
description: The smell of the sea fills the air.

title: Question Klaasje about the tape
description: You refused the tape Hardie offered you, wherein the hanged man supposedly testified his intent to rape and pillage. Does Klaasje know anything about the recording? You should ask her -- unless you like loose ends.

title: APT ORB / half light snoring
description: The snoring is... scary somehow. You should leave.

title: Investigate apartment #10 for the cleaning lady
description: The cleaning lady said the apartment should be empty, but there's definitely someone inside. Could it be *counterculture people*? Investigate and report back to the cleaning lady in the apartment building's hallway.

title: APT ORB / soup
description: Some leftovers kept warm on a stove top.

title: APT ORB / fake plants
description: Fake house plants made of plastic.

title: APT ORB / kitchen smell
description: Smells like buckwheat and onions here.

title: APT ORB / windows
description: Windows covered in old newspaper clippings.

title: APT ORB / windows logic
description: Can't they afford curtains?

title: APT ORB / biology textbook
description: A textbook for high school. Mathematics. Trigonometry mostly.

title: APT ORB / posters
description: Posters of contemporary pop stars adorn the walls.

title: APT ORB / books
description: Someone here is an avid reader of science fiction.

title: APT ORB / hum aid
description: Packages of humanitarian aid macaronis.

title: APT ORB / red astra
description: An empty pack of Red Astra cigarettes hidden under the bed.

title: Read the watermarks
description: Get in front of Kineema's headlights to read the halogen watermarks in your ledger. This may yield some information about who you are.

title: Fridge victim's body
description: You need to buy yourself more time to find whatever you're missing in the corpse. A fridge would allow you to preserve the body longer. Ask the Whirling, Frittte, or maybe Cuno, or some other local kids?

title: Find Morell, the Cryptozoologist
description: The ageing cryptozoologist has been out in the reeds for too long, and his wife, Lena, is very worried. Maybe you can find him when you happen to be on the coast?

title: Determine where the shot came from
description: Where could the shot that killed the hanged man have come from -- if not from the roof? This will take some checking out of locations.

title: Split a 'kilo' with Cuno
description: Enter flat #12 in the Capeside apartment building and get Cuno's speed. Sharing it with him will cement your friendship. And who knows what secrets it will lead to?

title: Help Soona with her project
description: Soona will cooperate with the ravers' nightclub plan... if you help her out with the research project first. Find the filament memory with an off-site copy from her old workplace and bring it back to her, then wait for further instructions. If you run into any problems you can always ask for Soona's help.

title: Make van Eyck's jam harder core
description: You can feel it -- this music could hit so much harder. It just needs a few tweaks... Walk back to the canal and see if you can find any tapes that could work as a melody, then bring them back to Egg Head for remixing.

title: Getting the Hanged Man's boots
description: In order to succeed 1) the body has to be down, 2) autopsy has to be finished, 3) and Kim has to be absent (he wouldn't approve). This will be *devilishly* tricky, so don't beat yourself up if you manage to send the body to the processing without getting hold of the boots.

title: The smoker on the balcony
description: You met a mysterious stranger smoking on the balcony of the apartment building north of Martinaise. He knows something about the murder. Find out where he lives and question him again.

title: Extract a motive
description: Why did he do this thing? Why???

title: Confront the Pigs and get your gun back
description: Someone's been running around with your sidearm pretending to be a police officer. You must meet her near the old fish market at 22:00 and get your service weapon back. Just walk past the fishing village until you see the boardwalk.

title: Track down your gun
description: Someone must know something about your lost firearm. Maybe a district authority, like someone high up in the Union? Or someone local, who saw you with it before you passed out -- the Whirling's absent bartender? You could also ask the local pawnshop.

title: Address Gaston's cheating in the pétanque game
description: Something looked off about the game the old men are playing on the plaza -- one of them (Gaston?) was cheating. Cheating in sports in unacceptable. Address this!

title: Get topping pie from Gary
description: It's waiting for you -- wheat-free, vegan deliciousness. Gary said he can give it to you once he's in the Whirling.

title: LAIR / FLASHLIGHT
description: You should take out your flashlight...

title: LAIR / DRAINAGE PIPE
description: Alternate path into Feld building.
